pages.text: This ritual calls on the Lord of Brews, summoning $(l:bewitchment:creatures/leonard)Leonard$() himself.$(br2)Make sure to keep him away from things you hold dear.$(br2)Prepare $(l:bewitchment:tools/grotesque_stew)$(item)Grotesque Stew$(), should you want to pledge to him.
The ritual is started by sacrificing a $(marked)Sheep$() with an $(l:bewitchment:tools/athame)$(item)Athame$().
